title: ELEMENTALIST LUX release? does dis belong in dis section??
body:
I want elementalist {{champion:99}} so badly and all deh peepz have been waiting rito gems plz release deh skin today or tomorrow xd <3 also i would like to say i was hoping for an ultimate lux skin xd and meh dreamz has come tru <3 pls do release it xd ty

Sincerely, A very cancerous lux main named Bagel -w-{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: As chameleon must take time to adapt to its surroundings, so must our grand elementalist.  I have no information or eta on her release, so hang tight and give her time to gather the elements.  Once she has, I'm sure we'll all be blown away...in at least 12 different ways.

12 different ways.... I love riddles, i have so many ideas in my head right now \(O_O)/
Thank you <3

Hmm.  Interesting!
http://imgur.com/a/Q0pf1
I bet you're just fucking with us and it's gonna be on Tuesday. ;)
One of these is true.
so on Thuesday ?
No the other one. They're fucking with us.
I hope 12 hours
2 more elements? maybe? xD

Just to make it clear, let me reiterate that I really don't have any information about Elementalist Lux.  At all.  I thought the combination of colors were 12, but I guess it's 10.  You'll want to bookmark the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page for any news on skin releases.  There's no riddle here!
:| my heart ur fucking with us

Never fear if he is **** with us then that means that it coming on Tuesday is not necessarily true so it may be coming earlier. We will make it through this Angel Sama I promise...{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
oml please just only be 12 hours I'm gonna die if I wait any longer lmao

12 different ways?

But she only has 10 laughs!

im gonna take that as a riddle and say its gonna be released in 12 hours or days xd but omg a rioter commented <3 LUV UUUUUUU {{champion:99}} 

Sincerely, Bagel.

"The German LoL FB page includes an extra message noting that the 3250 RP skin will be released on **November 28th**."

One more day, peeps.
One more day.....
On EU servers?? {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Well, definitely not on NA servers. I've been duped! :'(

I was sure they'd release it for the weekend, everyone could play a different element in All for One.... :T    But being forced to wait is killing the hype and my brain's arguments as to why I shouldn't spend money on rp is starting to win over my "I MUST HAVE THIS SKINNNN" hype....
Right
Riddle? its prob coming tuesday. 12 days is time for next patch.. lol
